MY CREATIVE PROCESS

All of my FULL STACK projects are based on a praticed formula to get the result that I am Looking for

User Stories

Description of the Application's functionality from the user's perspective. All user stories put together describe the entier application.

So user stories are basically a high level overview of the whole application, which will allow us developers to determine the exact features that we need to implement.

Architecture

Putting all the user stories into a nice FLOWCHART.
And how we build gives us ARCHITECTURE, It's like how we organize our code, and what features we will use. It essentially what holds all the code together, it gives us a strucutre in which we can then develope.

Development

IMPLEMENTATION OF OUR PLAN USING CODE
